mapper.select: select p.store_id as storeId, s.name as storeBrandName, p.id, p.name, p.price, p.discount_rate as discountRate, p.discount_price as discountPrice, p.thumbnail_image_path as thumbnailImagePath, p.thumbnail_image_name as thumbnailImageName, p.thumbnail_image_url as thumbnailImageUrl from product p join store s on p.store_id = s.id
